text: Ronald Vaughan Joyce, C.M. (October 19, 1930 â€“ January 31, 2019) was a Canadian entrepreneur and billionaire. He co-founded the Tim Hortons doughnut chain as Tim Horton's partner. He helped create Tim Horton Children's Camps and the Tim Horton Children's Foundation. He was named a member of the Order of Canada in 1992. == Net worth == In 2018, Forbes estimated his net worth to be around US$1.4 billion. Joyce died at his home in Burlington, Ontario on January 31, 2019 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian philanthropists Category:People from Nova Scotia Category:Businesspeople from Ontario Category:Canadian billionaires
title: Ron Joyce
